additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Onion^ (39%) (pieces, powder), starch (potato, corn), salt, sugar, yeast extract, natural flavours, mineral salt (potassium chloride), burnt sugar, vegetable oil, flavour enhancer (635), natural colour (turmeric), parsley, pepper extract. ^From sustainably grown onions. Contains naturally occurring glutamates.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Wheat, May Be Present Sesame, May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Fish, May Be Present Crustacea, May Be Present Egg, May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Lupin, May Be Present Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Great Taste is in our Nature. At Continental we partner with our farmers to grow all of our onions in our soups sustainably - growing crops in a way which minimises water and fertiliser use, protecting the biodiversity of the land and reducing energy consumption and waste. It's not only good For the planet but tastes great!
